meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fetid.
meanings.sent1: The fetidness of the garbage made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent2: The fetidness of the swamp was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The fetidness of the old socks was so bad, they tried to escape the laundry basket!
meanings.sent4: The fetidness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over the room.
meanings.sent5: The fetidness of the rotten eggs filled the entire kitchen with a nauseating smell.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a foul or offensive odor.
meanings.sent1: The fetidness of the sewer was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The fetidness of the fish market lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The fetidness of the cheese was so strong, it could be smelled from across the room!
meanings.sent4: The fetidness of the alleyway hit them like a wave of stench.
meanings.sent5: The fetidness of the skunk spray made them gag and run for cover.
